core.facade

Class TransactionFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.facade.TransactionFacade

  • public class TransactionFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Facade providing all possible actions concerning the Transaction type.
    Since:
    2021-01-03
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julien Wiegandt
